name: JAVR - Java automatic voice recognition
body:
### Welcome to JAVR - Java automatic voice recognition.
JAVR is an fully-automated voice recognition software written in Java. It is licensed under GNU General Public License
and free for everybody to use, modify and redistribute non-commercially.

### Under developement
JAVR is currently under heavy developement and not 100% working yet. At the moment, JAVR is able to understand you and print on screen what you said. I'm working on integration of WolframAlpha, Weather, News and RaspberryPi compatibility.

### Contact
You have any questions? Check out my [FAQ](https://help.github.com/pages) or [email](mailto:thimomerke@gmail.com) me and I'll help you out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
